title: Apple sending notice to developers invited to special WWDC 2022 in-person event
content:
Apple last month announced WWDC 2022, another edition of its annual developer conference. This year, however, Apple let developers register for an in-person event at Apple Park. Now the company is sending the notice to developers who have been chosen to join the special event.

moreâ€¦

The post Apple sending notice to developers invited to special WWDC 2022 in-person event appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple is now sending notice to developers who were invited to an in-person WWDC 2022 special event at Apple Park.
